These are the cross sections for helium that are used in
XPDP1 as developed by Verboncoeur et al. The formatting of
this file will hopefully work.

----------------------------------------

COMMENT
He
References:
1) Verboncoeur et al., J. Comp. Physics, 104, pp. 321-328 (1993).
http://ptsg.egr.msu.edu/pub/codes/xpdp1/
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
